title: Rebarber Family Chiropractic - Your Highland Park, NJ Chiropractor
description: Rebarber Family Chiropractic - Chiropractic Care in Highland Park, Princeton, and Hopewell, NJ
cleaned_text: For more information or to schedule an appointment with one of our offices, call [(732) 246-4242](tel:(732) 246-4242) today! The Highland Park & Princeton Chiropractors For Your Family! Dr. Wayne Rebarber and Dr. Kim Oman enjoy helping Highland Park and Princeton-area patients with today's safe and natural chiropractic care. Chiropractic can treat so much more than just your traditional back and neck pain. Chiropractic helps alleviate the symptoms you may be experiencing from a condition you wouldn't normally associate with the spine. Our goal here at Rebarber Family Chiropractic is to help you get well and stay well! The Rebarber Family Chiropractic team find it not only emotionally fulfilling, but also humbling when they get to help others with regular chiropractic care. They get to witness chiropractic miracles every day. Will yours be their next? We can explain how chiropractic produces results the natural way without drugs or surgery. If you are interested in learning more, call our Highland Park chiropractic office! We look forward to hearing from you! If you are new to seeing a chiropractor and want to find out more, please email us or call [(732) 246-4242](tel:(732) 246-4242) to receive personalized answers to your questions from our friendly team. We also welcome referrals, so we invite you to share our chiropractic and wellness information with your friends and loved ones. If you would like to stay informed about modern chiropractic care or if you want to start receiving free articles about health and wellness news, please subscribe to our bi-weekly newsletter, even if you are not a patient. Once you are subscribed, you will be able to explore our member wellness section and take advantage of our animated exercise videos, wellness articles, and other resources.
